decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
REASON:  To comply with the provisions of Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:Design and Access Statement;  ART/2023/CU406KR/EE01; ART/2023/CU406KR/EE02; ART/2023/CU406KR/ELPL; ART/2023/CU406KR/FE; ART/2023/CU406KR/PE01; ART/2023/CU406KR/PE02; ART/2023/CU406KR/SPLP
REASON: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.

Condition : 3 - Any plant and machinery, including that for smoke/fume extraction, ventilation, refrigeration and air conditioning, shall be so installed, used and thereafter retained so as to prevent the transmission of noise, vibration and odour/fume into any neighbouring premises.
REASON: In the interests of residential amenity and to meet with the aims of the National Planning Policy Framework (2021), policies D3 and D14 of the London Plan (2021), and Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Plan (2013).

Condition : 4 - The level of noise emitted from any new plant including that used for ventilation, refrigeration, air conditioning and fume extraction shall be lower than the existing background level by at least 10LpA. Noise levels shall be determined at one meter from the window of the nearest noise sensitive premises. The back ground noise level shall be expressed as the lowest LA 90 (10 minutes) during which plant is or may be in operation.
REASON: In the interests of residential amenity and to meet with the aims of the National Planning Policy Framework (2021), policies D3 and D14 of the London Plan (2021), and Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Plan (2013).

Condition : 5 - The premises hereby permitted shall not be open to customers outside of the following hours unless otherwise agreed in writing with the Local Planning Authority:
Sunday to Thursday and Bank Holidays 09:00am to 9:00pm
Friday and Saturday 09:00am to 10:00pm
REASON: In the interests of residential amenity and to meet with the aims of the National Planning Policy Framework (2021), policies D3 of the London Plan (2021), and Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Plan (2013).

Condition : 6 - Prior to first occupation of the use hereby permitted details of secure cycle parking spaces in accordance with London Plan (2021) standards shall be submitted and approved in writing by the local planning authority.  The cycle parking spaces shall thereafter be retained.
REASON: To promote sustainable transport in accordance with policy T5 of The London Plan (2021).

Condition : 7 - The development hereby permitted shall adhere to the Healthier Catering Commitment Standards for the lifetime of the development.
REASON: To promote healthier catering in the interest of a healthy population in accordance with policy E9 of the London Plan (2021)
description: Change of use from retail (Use class E) to hot food takeaway (Use class Sui Generis); Installation of extraction flue at rear
